text: Monroe City can refer to several places in the United States: *Monroe City, Illinois, a small unincorporated community in the historic Bluff Precinct of Monroe County *Monroe City, Indiana, a town in Harrison Township, Knox County *Monroe City, Missouri, a city in Marion, Monroe, and Ralls counties *Monroe City, Georgia, a city in and the county seat of Walton County ==See also== * Monroe (disambiguation)
title: Monroe City
